attributes.action: David cameron must stand down has prime minister
attributes.background:
Cameron is not fit to run this country
Time and time again he has not listened to the people born here
Rufused a vote of no confidence to be debated in parliment though it was signed nearly 200,000 times
We need to stand up and be counted NOW
He's ruined what once used to be great britain

rejection.details: The decision of an individual Minister to stand down is one for that individual to take, not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
